DOC.brief_summary: This study design test impact 12-week online behavioral modification program weight loss , without fortify beverage . Subjects randomize four condition : 1 ) Online Basic Lifestyle Counseling ( OBLI ) ; 2 ) Online Lifestyle Counseling ( OLC ) ; 3 ) OBLI plus beverage ( BEV ) ; 4 ) OLC + BEV . The three hypothesis : 1 ) 12 week , individual OLC condition would lose weight OBLI ; 2 ) 12 week , OLC + BEV condition would lose weight OLC condition ; 3 ) 12 week , OBLI + BEV condition would lose weight OBLI condition .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Online Behavioral Weight Loss Program
DOC.detailed_description: This study test impact innovative combination fortify beverage ( diet cola contain green tea extract , soluble dextrin fiber , caffeine ) online support weight loss program multi-center randomize clinical trial . The study compare impact combination beverage online behavioral modification treatment program 12 week three treatment center US EU .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 40 ; 2. age 18 65 year ; 3. blood pressure le 140 mmHg systolic 90 mmHg diastolic ; 4. caffeine intake 100400 mg/d ; 5. ability participate physical activity minimum 150 min/week . 1. pregnancy , lactation actively try become pregnant ; 2. medical illness medication could affect body weight ; 3. cigarette smoker ; 4. weight loss 10 pound last 3 month ; 5. fast blood glucose great 126mg/dl ; 6. participation clinical research study would conflict purpose current trial ; 7. factor judgment principal investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol .
